title: Falling for Ann
description: Ann Gibson is the youngest child of the famous Gibson Family. She’s a kindergarten teacher, loves to read mysteries, and watch sports. However, she did not inherit the athletic ability her six, often extremely overprotective, older brothers did. She hasn’t had the easiest time dating because of them either. Throw in the latest developments in her life and out comes their overprotective nature again.Graham Adams is a lawyer for several movie stars and high-profile people in Los Angeles and quickly discovers he can be just as protective as Ann’s older brothers. The night Graham met Ann he fell head over heels. Despite her brother’s antics, he is determined to see where the relationship goes. However, when a situation arises that puts Ann in danger, Graham finds he will do anything to keep her safe—even if it destroys their relationship.Will a case of mistaken identity ruin everything?
author: Heather Austin
